Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I tried multiple variations of the execute_shell command to activate the arcgis environment, but all attempts resulted in a "No such file or directory" error. I attempted different paths and commands such as /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /home, /opt/anaconda3/bin/activate, /opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/miniconda3/bin/activate, /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/conda/bin/activate, /opt/anaconda3/bin/activate, and /home/kat/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh. All attempts returned the same error.
"""
